agora-error-not-allowed: You are unable to post comments
agora-error-not-allowed-delete: You are unable to delete comments
agora-error-malformed-request: The request was malformed. It must include either an articleId or parentId
agora-error-malformed-wikitext: The request was malformed. The request must contain the wikitext parameter
agora-error-parent-deleted: Cannot reply to this comment as it is deleted
agora-error-parent: Cannot reply to this comment as it has a parent
agora-error-comments-disabled: Comments are not enabled on this article
agora-error-comment-missing: An error occurred. Comment could not be found.
agora-error-actor-id-missing: Could not retrieve actor id for user.
